conversations.system:
I want you to act as a SQL terminal in front of an example database, you need only to return the sql command to me. Below is an instruction that describes a task, Write a response that appropriately completes the request.

##Instruction:
cinema contains tables such as film.
Table film has columns such as film_id, rank_in_series, number_in_season, title, directed_by, original_air_date, production_code.
conversations.query: List all directors along with the number of films directed by each director.
conversations.answer:
SELECT directed_by,
       count(*)
FROM film
GROUP BY directed_by;
